TopicTitle: New planet pack for ksp1 called expansion to the stars

Articles.Content:
This new mod adds new star systems around Kerbo, one of the most mysterious is the Courye system. It is a system where it is all mysterious and strange with curiosities and full of theories, it is the first of the approximately unofficial 5 or 4 star systems with references to real systems and many more things.

I still don't see photos or download link since it is in a very early version, even so we have the confirmation of a planet called Eldor with a single moon and a desert terrain with no atmosphere with a captured asteroid.

This pack will have two confirmed translation languages that are English and Spanish. Every day new things are done and extreme bugs are corrected. I will be reporting on this new pack and the first photos will arrive shortly. thanks for keeping up c:
